cast.name: 查尔斯·马丁内斯 Charles Martinet

introduction: A young man takes advantage of the Hellvirgin to save the world, but seeing that it made no difference undoes his deed.Dare to watch this short despite of the lack of subtitles because it's really amazing (and there's really not so much dialogues in it). The puppets and the use of traditional stop-motion techniques mixed with the dream- or illusion-like scenes of live-action are breathtaking. But can you expect anything else from Riho Unt after watching his shorts posted at Surreal Moviez?
